title: Fix issue with interpolated string from assigns
body:
There was an issue interpolating an string from an assigned request. This was described in this issue:

https://github.com/fcsonline/drill/issues/35

Fixing it.

title: Add documentation for using JSON stored in a CSV
body:
Improving the code to panic with a better message when the yaml file is
malformed.

title: Multilevel references for interpolator
body: I've added multilevel references for interpolator

title: Support multiple cookies
body: It used to pick a random one.

title: Improve general performance
body:
I fixed two small performance issues:

- Avoid interpolator if there are no interpolations
- Avoid SSL initialization if is not `htttps`

Other:

- Extracted relative path resolver from interpolator

title: Update crate to Rust 2018 syntax
body: Run 'cargo fix --edition' to update crate to Rust 2018 syntax

title: Return 520 on bad connection
body: Increases robustness on connection refused errors, which may occur in overload scenarios. At the moment this results in a panic fail of the whole bench. With this change it will be converted to a 520 error and the bench continues.

title: Nanoseconds
body:
Shows duration in summary stats in nanoseconds for those who want to squeeze know it. Running benchmark against the testserver with `-sqn` yields:

```
Threads 20
Iterations 3
Rampup 2
Base URL http://localhost:9000


Fetch organizations       Total requests            60
Fetch organizations       Successful requests       60
Fetch organizations       Failed requests           0
Fetch organizations       Median time per request   119034191ns
Fetch organizations       Average time per request  119306601ns
Fetch organizations       Sample standard deviation 7650892ns

...

Fetch sub comments        Total requests            60
Fetch sub comments        Successful requests       0
Fetch sub comments        Failed requests           60
Fetch sub comments        Median time per request   117718216ns
Fetch sub comments        Average time per request  120675522ns
Fetch sub comments        Sample standard deviation 11199586ns

Concurrency Level         20
Time taken for tests      5.9 seconds
Total requests            1020
Successful requests       900
Failed requests           120
Requests per second       174.20 [#/sec]
Median time per request   116521979ns
Average time per request  112444793ns
Sample standard deviation 25777580ns
```

title: Stats per job
body:
Adds summary statistics per named job and adds a quiet option. I.e. running drill with `-sq` on test benchmark results in 

```
Threads 20
Iterations 3
Rampup 2
Base URL http://localhost:9000


Fetch user from assign    Total requests            60
Fetch user from assign    Successful requests       60
Fetch user from assign    Failed requests           0
Fetch user from assign    Median time per request   114ms
Fetch user from assign    Average time per request  117ms
Fetch user from assign    Sample standard deviation 10ms

...

Fetch account             Total requests            60
Fetch account             Successful requests       60
Fetch account             Failed requests           0
Fetch account             Median time per request   111ms
Fetch account             Average time per request  115ms
Fetch account             Sample standard deviation 8ms

Concurrency Level         20
Time taken for tests      5.9 seconds
Total requests            1020
Successful requests       899
Failed requests           121
Requests per second       171.64 [#/sec]
Median time per request   115ms
Average time per request  111ms
Sample standard deviation 26ms
```

title: with_items_range
body:
Adds a support for a generator of numeric item ids from an iterator. Simply specify `with_items_range:` in the config with numeric values for start, step, stop. Each value is optional and will default to 1.

So, for your example valid options are

```yaml
  - name: Fetch some users by iter
    request:
      url: /api/users/{{ item }}
    with_items_range:
      start: 70
      step: 5
      stop: 76
```

or
```yaml
  - name: Fetch some users by iter
    request:
      url: /api/users/{{ item }}
    with_items_range:
      stop: 3
```

title: HEAD support
body: Minor change to add HEAD as supported http method.

title: First draft - Allow override of csv quote value
body:
In the configuration file, allow new way specify item csv file and override
default csv quote character.  This is necessary for (possibly bad) csv files
that have single-quoted fields that contain commas.

title: Allow everything but first character of an identifier to be a number
body:
Spent a long time trying to figure out why identifiers like {{addr1}} and
{{zip4} wouldn't work.

title: Added --no-check-certificate command line option
body:
Implemented as per suggested in [Feature Request: Option to disable validation for ssl certificates #5](https://github.com/fcsonline/drill/issues/5).

If there's more similar global options added, I think some kind of a config struct would be useful to have. For now just added this particular option to the necessary function signatures. It's inserted to the `context` object when being passed to `Runnable`s to avoid polluting the signatures there (and since the `context` object was already being passed anyhow).

Needed to bump up the version number for `hyper-native-tls`. Might need to run `cargo clean` before building.
